means: 卢克（男子名， <圣经>中译为“路加”）

sentence.Network_en: I felt so self-conscious under Luke's mother's intense gaze.
sentence.Network_cn: 在卢克母亲审视的目光下，我感到极不自在。

sentence.Network_en: Luke answered by tightening his grip on her shoulder.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢克的回应就是把她的肩头抓得更紧了。

sentence.Network_en: Luke's mother stopped smiling and looked reproachfully at him.
sentence.Network_cn: 卢克的妈妈收起了笑容，用责备的眼光看着他。
